name: Factory Smokes - Candela - Toro
additionalNotes: Factory Smokes come in four different wrappers. The blend is similar across all the cigar lines under the Factory Smokes brand.Â Factory Smokes carry premium leftover mixed fillers. Drew Estate hand rolls these babies at La Gran Fabrica de Drew Estate Factory in Esteli, Nicaragua. Keep in mind that La Gran Fabrica factory also produces some of the ultra-premium Drew Estate cigars. For this reason, Factory Smokes carry both long fillers and short fillers from dynamite brands like Liga Privada.
